sentences.sentence: Most popular contemporary boat - a wide variety of sloops available.
sentences.translation: 最为流行的现代帆船结构——意味着有大量品种可供选择。

sentences.sentence: Sloops come in all sizes, from 8-foot dinghies to maxi boats over a hundred feet long.
sentences.translation: 单桅帆船有各种尺寸，从8英尺的小艇到一百多英尺长的超大帆船。

sentences.sentence: Note that in both of the sloops shown so far, the jib reaches to the top of the masthead.
sentences.translation: 请注意：在目前我们展示的两种单桅帆船中，前帆都连接到桅杆的顶端。
